about_the_game:
Delve into a VHS-style single player FPS experience blending survival horror and classic horror.
Battle against Shaggoths and Necrozombies as you collect resources and fight to survive, all while uncovering the terrifying secrets of H.P. Lovecraft's "In the Mountains of Madness".

YOU WILL:
  • Explore forests, an abandoned factory and a hospital;
  • Gather resources for survival in the form of medicines and ammo;
  • Read notes to find out what's going on and to move forward;
  • Fight necrozombies and shoggoths using firearms.

STORY

The main protagonist is a special forces soldier sent on a mission to rescue hostages. During the mission, he encounters a secret organization attempting to resurrect mythical creatures - the shoggoths. Players must battle monsters and uncover terrifying secrets in order to save the hostage and escape alive from this nightmare.



ENEMY

The Shoggoths, monstrous entities from the realm of H.P. Lovecraft, are a formidable threat with unique abilities. They can reanimate corpses and manipulate them into becoming necrotic zombies, or combine to form a single, more powerful being. To defeat them, it is essential to stay composed and focused, as they have the ability to transfer to another host upon the death of a zombie.



Enjoy advanced dismemberment system and play through the first of three planned series, with each installment as an add-on.
Developed by a single person, this game will test your survival skills.
